languages.text: "Хм. Возможно, я высказался недостаточно понятно. Право забрать жизнь Эзирраеш..."
"Hmm. Perhaps I did not make myself clear. The right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh—"
languages.original_text: "Хм. Возможно, я высказался недостаточно понятно. Право забрать жизнь Эзирраеш..."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. Perhaps I did not make myself clear. The right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh—"

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. Perhaps I did not make myself clear. The right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh—"

languages.text: “嗯，或许是我没太说清楚。只有艾泽拉什家族的人，才有权利夺走——”
languages.original_text: "Hmm. Perhaps I did not make myself clear. The right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh—"

traits.locale_text: “嗯，或许是我没太说清楚。只有艾泽拉什家族的人，才有权利夺走——”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ふむ。言葉が足りなかったようだな。アエジレシュの命を奪う権利は…」
languages.original_text: "Hmm. Perhaps I did not make myself clear. The right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh—"

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ。言葉が足りなかったようだな。アエジレシュの命を奪う権利は…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Hum. Tal vez no me haya expresado con claridad. El derecho a arrebatar la vida de un Aezyrraesh...».
languages.original_text: "Hmm. Perhaps I did not make myself clear. The right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh—"

traits.locale_text: «Hum. Tal vez no me haya expresado con claridad. El derecho a arrebatar la vida de un Aezyrraesh...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Hmm... Peut-être ne me suis-je pas bien fait comprendre. Le droit d'ôter la vie d'un Aezyrraesh... »
languages.original_text: "Hmm. Perhaps I did not make myself clear. The right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh—"

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... Peut-être ne me suis-je pas bien fait comprendre. Le droit d'ôter la vie d'un Aezyrraesh... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hmm. Vielleicht habe ich mich nicht klar ausgedrückt. Nur ein Aezyrraesh hat das Recht, das Leben ..."
languages.original_text: "Hmm. Perhaps I did not make myself clear. The right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh—"

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. Vielleicht habe ich mich nicht klar ausgedrückt. Nur ein Aezyrraesh hat das Recht, das Leben ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Hmm. Perhaps I did not make myself clear. The right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh—"

languages.text: "Hımm... Belki de kendimi yeterince açık ifade edemedim. Bir Aezyrraesh'in canını alma hakkı..."
